column4: anyone have a clue how to change the default icon for a MIME type in 2.8 .. old dialog is gone and new one doesn't seem to support it
blah .. there is a perfectly decent icon to use
right click, properties. click on the picture...
people seemed to be refering to the icon  :/
again that doesn't change the default icon for that MIME type
never occured to me to care about a picture so much  :/
I don't know that much about GNOME internals, and the people that do appear to be busy...
ugh, -L is list files installed by.
making sure its installed... then showing you what it is...
